EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Enables radio mode in Chrome web browser

RADIO_MODE_START.description: Tooltip text when radio button is paused

RADIO_MODE_DISABLED.message: Radio mode can be used only in livestream. Please refresh the page if any issues.
RADIO_MODE_DISABLED.description: Tooltip text when radio button is disabled

RADIO_MODE_END.description: Tooltip text when audio is being played in radio mode

AUTOPLAY_VIDEO_ON_RADIO_END.message: Autoplay video when radio mode ends

POPUP_EXT_NAME.description: Title of extension in popup window
